benchmark_details.name: GeoBiked
benchmark_details.overview: GeoBiked is a dataset designed to advance Deep Generative Models (DGMs) in engineering design, featuring 4,355 bicycle images annotated with structural and technical features, aimed at enabling researchers to automate data labeling and perform generative tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a foundation to apply DGMs in engineering design processes and facilitate the experimentation of developers with domain-specific applications.

data.source: Composed of bicycle images extracted and curated from BIKED dataset, with additional structural annotations.
data.annotation: Annotated with geometric features and technical descriptors.

methodology.calculation: Calculated as pixel-wise distances between predicted locations and ground-truth locations.
methodology.interpretation: Lower MAE and MSE values indicate better accuracy in geometric point predictions.
methodology.validation: Validated through experiments comparing annotations from a subset of the dataset.
